snippet: A former National Archives employee pleaded guilty on Tuesday to stealing and selling recordings from the archives, including an original 1937 sound recording of Babe Ruth that he sold for $34.74.
lead_paragraph: A former National Archives employee pleaded guilty on Tuesday to stealing and selling recordings from the archives, including an original 1937 sound recording of Babe Ruth that he sold for $34.74.

headline.main: Maryland: Guilty Plea in Theft From Archives
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Guilty Plea in Theft From Archives
